productDetails.attr_value: Machine wash or professional dry clean

info.goods_name: SHEIN EZwear Summer Solid Black Rib-Knit Bodycon Short Dress

description_multi.name: Shoulder
description_multi.description: Measure from where the shoulder seam meets the sleeve on one side to another side.

description_multi.name: Bust
description_multi.description: Measure from the stitches below the armpits on one side to another.

description_multi.name: Waist
description_multi.description: Measure straight across the narrowest waist line from edge to edge.

description_multi.name: Hips
description_multi.description: Measure straight across the widest hip line from edge to edge.

description_multi.name: Length
description_multi.description: Measure from where the shoulder seam meets the collar to the hem.

description_multi.name: Sleeves
description_multi.description: Measure from where the shoulder seam meets armhole to the cuff.

sellingPoint.tag_val_desc: Comfortable and breathable, soft and delicate to the touch

items.title: Safe Payments
items.desc: Your payment at SHEIN is secured with global payment security certifications.

items.title: 2. Package safety
items.desc: Full refund or resend shipment of your damaged or lost package.

items.title: 3. About Covid-19
items.desc: SHEIN follows strict protocols to sterilize warehouse and packages prior to shipment.

items.title: Privacy Protection
items.desc: SHEIN respects the privacy of users and visitors on our site, and we are committed to protecting it through maintaining industry-standard physical, technical, and administrative measures designed to guard your personal data from unauthorized processing, use or disclosure.

product_comments.content: Love this shirt it is so funny now I’m just going to type to fill in space (plz like I’m broke)
Don’t you just love dark humor ❤️
unless you like baggy shirts definitely size down but i don’t mind so i love this shirt :)
